title: Daathic Darkwings
description: In the sixth overwhelming installment, our heroes defend Silver Wind Island from the invasion of Darkwings! They combine all their powers and show them what it takes to be heroes!The party ship across the dangerous seas in order to confront the Consultant himself and to have their final battle!From fire based shurikens to Rostical using tanks, our heroes pull out all their trump cards to defeat the skeletal creatures from causing any more havoc!
author: Michael  Rogers
